name: Starwood
overview: STARWOOD ENERGY GROUP GLOBAL, L.L.C. (â€œStarwood Energyâ€), an affiliate of Starwood Capital Group Global, L.L.C. (â€œStarwood Capitalâ€), is a private equity investment firm based in Greenwich, CT, that specializes in energy infrastructure investments. Founded in 2005, Starwood Energy has committed to seven transactions representing nearly $4.9 billion in enterprise value and has developed a deep pipeline of power/energy investment opportunities. The investment approach of Starwood Energy parallels the successful strategy in real estateâ€”a focus on locational supply and demand and replacement cost. Since inception in 1991, Starwood Capital and its predecessors have invested approximately $5.4 billion of equity capital in over 300 transactions representing $20.0 billion in enterprise value.
